Detailed Description

3d objects with own (local) and relative transformations.

This class provides entire control functionality for playing 3d robot animation. Robot3D has hierarchic tree of 3d objects.

Member Function Documentation

void Create (  ObjRef< Object3D >  o3d  ) 
 

Builds hierarchic tree of 3d objects from specified Object3D object.

Need to call once time at beginning of creation of Robot3D object. After this any new calls of Create() are not allowed.

Parameters:
o3d - pointer to Object3D class object.
